name: River City Ransom (fan game) beat em up
name_original: River City Ransom (fan game) beat em up
description:
There are TONS of Kunio homebrews out there but none capture the FEEL of the original quite like this one.  This is for my fellow devs who want to make a beat em up.  Unfortunately there aren't many tutorials / documentation out there for aspiring devs.  Follow my tutorials on YouTube. This is a taste of a larger vision.  I hope y'all enjoy it.  More, MUCH more to come soon. Stay tuned!!!

     NOTE:  There are hidden secrets in this demo.  The garbage cans and MORE are tucked away somewhere ...Figure it out PEOPLE!!!!!! And post a vid. of you discovering my hidden secrets. I'd love to see it.

Follow @birpStudios

YouTube, Twitter..all that crap!!!!

Old School classic controls..  Support for XBoxController   (button 'X'  => Spawn allies)

....Keyboard: Arrow keys to move, 

                             'X' & 'C' = button 1 & button2

                             numPad 0 => Spawn Allies                                            

                              Enter = start button
